website_summaries.verdict: If you want an LG OLED TV with one of the latest processors, this model is worth considering.
pros: Offers LG's updated a9 processor that's speedy and makes colors and contrast appear almost lifelike
55-inch screen is a good choice for most rooms
Also includes the brand's AI ThinQ technology, magic remote, and Alexa compatibility

website_summaries.verdict: Totally cutting edge. The OLED module places picture directly on the glass for a flawless image. LG's most advanced intelligent processor seals the deal.
pros: AI ThinQ system with Google Assistant
The a9 Intelligent processor boosts screen sharpness and depth while providing exceptional color accuracy
cons: Does not support HBO streaming app
Some report trouble with stream stuttering

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: When I got this TV it was amazing. It has tons of features and looks amazing. Plus it works really well with games.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Elzy

customer_reviews.title: Can you add an EXTRA STAR RATING?!!
customer_reviews.text: First time we turned it on, I stood for half an hour watching Discovery Channel, mesmerized. It was like I was inside the forest. Football and sports are like a different experience all together. Feels like you're on the field. If we had the space and money, we would have gone for the 75"! But the 65" is eye-popping! The remote is a learning curve but what isn't? Our 2 dogs watch Dog TV and think the dogs are in the living room!! The picture on glass is like the picture floats on air. Just a fabulous TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jbeaux

customer_reviews.title: Picture Quality Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Had this 65 inch monstrosity for about 6 months. I can say that at first there were some quirks with the remote as it wouldn't select things on the menu. After a couple of firmware upgrades, it went away and it is a bit smoother. The picture is just phenomenal. I plan to use this as my main workhorse to study and play games and watch videos. My eyesight is not that great (-6.5 on both eyes w/ astigmatism and retinal detachment), but I can clearly see the difference w/ 4k. The connections selection, menus, options, is great. You are not going to be disappointed if you procure this TV.
customer_reviews.author: hugeyeti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV to replace an old plasma TV. The picture quality is excellent. The TV arrived in perfect condition. The frame is very thin and blends in well in a living room.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This TV is substantially more expensive than similar sized competitors, but it is well worth the extra money. The black levels are amazing (reminds me of great plasma TVs), refresh is spot on, and the color is great. We selected the E series OLED for the enhanced sound and glass screen protection. I did not want a soundbar and the internal sound on this unit is good enough that you don't need one. Don't get me wrong the sound isn't going to blow you away, but it is serviceable and good enough for ballgames and movies without constant volume adjustment for to hear conversations. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for the best picture available.
customer_reviews.author: SSN

customer_reviews.title: For the price, the value is incredible.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture. Best in a light controlled room especially given glass screen. Sound is a clear step up from the C series. Overall a great display with some minor ergonomics issues. Screen could be more anti-reflective. With a table lamp 12 feet back and at a 30 degree angle, reflections are bold on the panel. Cabinet design does not quite create a true floating impression. Control system in the rear is rather thick and lacks easy cable management.
customer_reviews.author: S. DiThomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture & Easy to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: I had not previously owned an LG t.v. but wanted to get an OLED and choose this one. Amazing picture. Easy to use and get to Netflix, Amazon, and others. Real easy for a non t.v. geek to set up. We will be purchasing another 55 inch and a 65 inch in the next couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, near perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is one hell of a TV. The picture quality looks amazing. Cons: 1. No HBO GO or NOW. Disappointing!!! 2. In some dark scenes picture looks a little mushy/patchy. Sometimes spiral patterns (oil in water like ) appear. Not sure if it's the TV or the video quality itself.
customer_reviews.author: Stark

customer_reviews.title: Finally figured out that it needed a pixel refresh.
customer_reviews.text: Initial setup presented a dark picture with poor resolution. After struggling for a couple weeks to improve the picture with not much success, I tried the pixel refresh. Incredible difference. Love the TV.
customer_reviews.author: RCD1952

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect black levels, built in Atmos makes delivers incredible sound for a TV, absolutely stunning picture, especially with Dolby Vision content. Only problem is the stutter on bright scenes. I know it's a common OLED problem, and most people can't even see it, but it drives me nuts. LG, please release a dynamic refresh rate software update!
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: Makes everything look better
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Difficult to get sufficient brightness at first. After playing with settings for a while, it seems fine now. The remote control is very awkward. Whoever designed it should be fired, BUT what really matters is that this TV is beautiful beyond imagination. If it were any more beautiful it wouldn't be realistic. I could not be more pleased with the pictures I'm getting. Play with the settings. Then play with them again.
customer_reviews.author: NeoPantera

customer_reviews.title: dark not so clear Oled tv is joke
customer_reviews.text: It is not good TV at all, you have to try this TV for local TV broadcast programs, it never perform on store front display model look so good that never get to you, even disc never get same kind of pictures quality. I contact LG to offer them give back to them but did not responded to me. I use Samsung 32inc TV all the time. if you know something what I did or how to do it setting up or any thing Please let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Hiroshi Shimizu

customer_reviews.title: You get what you are willing to Pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality TV!...Eye Candy! ..Wonderful Viewing Experience!.... It's crazy! Great...great...great, just one thing -be sure to get latest 4K HDMI cables, it definitely make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya D.

customer_reviews.title: The glass on tv is completely shattered.
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this purchase. You spend so much money on a tv the least you expect is that it gets delivered to you intact. When I opened the box, the glass on the tv on the back and the bottom was completely shattered! And it’s a big tv, it’s a hassle to pack it back into the box!
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow. The picture on this TV is AMAZING! No flashlight effect on black screens.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R

customer_reviews.title: Stunning display, deep rich blacks. Awesome interface and design
customer_reviews.text: Love this TV, first OLED ever. Simply stunning and amazing, even in standard mode. Great software.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio H

customer_reviews.title: Wow, spectacular image even in bright room
customer_reviews.text: The picture is unbelievable. It is so clear and the contrast is so amazing. The image is clear in a bright room and I couldn't bed happier.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah G.

customer_reviews.title: Must Know What Contents to Play!!
customer_reviews.text: Ads placement isn’t that bad. For people that complain, you just aren’t playing the right contents. For those who don’t use Cable tvs, for those that utilize streaming services; your minds will be blown right before your eyes (HDR/Dolby Vision in a dark room!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Bose 300 Soundbar connection issue
customer_reviews.text: The picture quslity on this OLED TV is amazing. LG obviously has the best on the market. My only issue is the lack of the ability to connect properly with my Bose 300 soundbar through the magic remote. Think it’s a Bise issue though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: It was a 2018 model I bought in 2020 saved $500 because of it.
customer_reviews.text: The delivery service included placing in room of choice, unboxing, mounting, and disposal of box even though when I bought it said none of that was included. I thought that was strange but didn't complain about it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Kupper

customer_reviews.title: awesome picture
customer_reviews.text: setup was quick and easy. the tv linked itself to directv remote. picture is outstanding,bright, and full of color. well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Nelton Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control issues.
customer_reviews.text: This very expensive TV had a defect on the screen as soon as I turned it on. The supplier would not replace the set and my only option was to return it. This was a very disappointing transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Massa

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV for the living room. It was exactly what I was looking and works better than I expectedly. The image just pops making you feel you are in the show.
customer_reviews.author: Polytheus

customer_reviews.title: N/A
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture quality. Overall good. Only thing I don’t like is the volume control. The announcement is higher than the actual volume.
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: Overall amazing TV
customer_reviews.text: Awesome TV!! Amazing picture and perfectly blends into the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This TV has a really good picture. And I love the 55” screen.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Adams

customer_reviews.title: Stunning TV!
customer_reviews.text: This tv is stunning. The best picture I’ve ever seen and so sleek and modern looking. Truly a technological masterpiece!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture quality. Love how thin the tv is. The brightness is good enough for all types of viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Abhay P.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV
customer_reviews.text: It came perfectly, like new, out of box. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Read the reviews, they are true
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional picture quality on this set. All the reviews you might find on this wonderful TV are correct, this is best in class.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Dog

customer_reviews.title: Muliuse.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, colors are vivid not too big for the room.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L Barnhart

customer_reviews.text: The tv does not work, it’s now two weeks with nothing , out 4400 , still have to wait two more weeks , the reduction s worthless , the store sold it is a fraud , I am contacted Ng an attorney
customer_reviews.author: MIchael Schiffman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been so disappointed with this TV. Poor picture quality, horrible sound and the icons burned into my screen after 2 years! The $500 tv I bought for a guest room is much better. I have to replace this piece of junk after 2 years. Find another model.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great picture.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the picture is great. We did add a sound bar to enhance the sound. I highly recommend. Be aware that it is pretty heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G. Haley

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with external speakers
customer_reviews.text: I just hooked up the TV to external speakers through the digital cable output to a receiver and the sound cuts out every 5 minutes. The sound works perfectly when the same cable is connected to the Xfinity box, so the problem is definitely with the TV. (The sound does not cut out using the TV's builtin speakers, but they sound absolutely terrible). LG refuses to repair it because I brought the TV over a year ago, so I will have to replace the entire set because of lousy quality control on a $2 component. I will never by LG again.
customer_reviews.author: ColinE

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware, screen burn in
customer_reviews.text: I spent a small fortune on this TV brand new. After a year I have screen burn in from an xbox game my family plays (Rockband). It's very clear to see and will not go away. I contacted LG and was not provided an adequate solution. I have had a Samsung for 10 years and the picture is still amazing, my next TV will be Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Amazing TV with a $2.00 remote
customer_reviews.text: I've never seen a quality picture like this, it's amazing! BUT, don't Buyers have every right to fear for our product's long-term reliability when the LG remote doesn't offer back-lighting? If LG is too cheap to back-light its remote (while they gloat about how dark the TV's blacks are), what other cheap components are inside? (We already know the table stand couldn't be flimsier). And what's with the netflix & amazon buttons on the remote, did they supply the remote I'm stuck with? Poor decisions, LG, real poor.
customer_reviews.author: baileysbca

customer_reviews.title: Rivals pioneer plasma
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture....being an a/v nut since the 70s this is the only set that may actually have a better picture than my pioneer kuro plasma .... highly recommend.. have two weeks now...no problems..not one issue with anything ...I don't use the apps...all I wanted was the best picture.....that's what I got !
customer_reviews.author: robert a.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Great Picture and decent sound quality . Sometimes I have to reinstall apps but not sure if that is an issue with TV or something else . Overall pleasing to eyes
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: All LG OLEDs have screen problems...
customer_reviews.text: LG HAS A MAJOR FLAW IN ALL OLED models! Numerous forums have people complaining about one half of the screen being a shade darker than the other half. And still no solutions from LG so far except for, “It’s outside of the 1-year warranty so we’re not helping you.” When I paid $2,800 for this in 2018 I didn’t expect troubles like this (also an HDMI port that glitches) or crap customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Screen burns in images
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy an LG OLED TV. The screen will burn in images and LG will not fix it. Pure garbage
customer_reviews.author: Edward Jasudowich

product_meta.title: LG Electronics OLED55E8PUA 55-Inch 4K Ultra HD Smart OLED TV (2018 Model)
product_meta.description:
Size:55 -Inch| Style:TVThe elegant E8 is exquisitely crafted with a unique glass design to make a captivating statement in your living room. This new LG OLED TV with AI (Artificial Intelligence) ThinQ becomes the hub for the smart home: Using Intelligent Voice control, speak into the LG Magic Remote to pull up family photos, control light settings, check the weather and more. Movies, sports and games come to thrilling new life, more immersive with the perfect black and intense color made possible by LG OLED display technology. The new α9 (Alpha9) Intelligent Processor makes the most of the self-illuminating pixels, providing true-to-life images with rich colors, superior sharpness and enhanced depth. The E8 features comprehensive support of major 4K high dynamic range formats including premium Dolby Vision, as well as HDR10 and HLG. And to complete the home cinema experience, the included sound bar delivers immersive, detailed Dolby Atmos audio that puts you into the midst of every moment.

*Service limited to certain languages. Some features require 3rd party service subscription.
*Dolby Vision is a trademark of Dolby Laboratories.
*Dolby, Dolby Atmos and the double-D symbol are registered trademarks of Dolby Laboratories. Power Supply (Voltage, Hz) - 120Vac 50-60Hz
feature_bullets: LG OLED TV with AI (Artificial Intelligence) ThinQ has the Google Assistant built in, so you can control compatible smart home devices using just your voice through the LG Magic Remote. Create a center for your smart home and beyond. Plus it works with Amazon Alexa devices (sold separately).

The α9 Intelligent Processor inside the LG OLED TV with AI ThinQ is the most powerful ever from LG. Developed exclusively for LG OLED TV, the new α9 processor noticeably enhances sharpness and depth while delivering vastly more accurate colors, for the ultimate in picture quality.

Pixel Level Dimming enables each of the 8.3 million individually lit pixels of the LG OLED TV with AI ThinQ to brighten, dim or power off completely, achieving perfect black and displaying a level of picture detail impossible with any other television technology.

4K Cinema HDR on LG OLED TV with AI ThinQ features comprehensive support of major high dynamic range formats including Dolby Vision, as well as HDR10 and HLG, both with LG’s advanced tone-mapping technology that provides scene-by-scene optimization.
Dolby Atmos is the same audio technology developed for state-of-the-art cinemas, with immersive sound that appears to come from everywhere, putting you in the middle of all the excitement.

LG OLED Display uses the latest panels, with brighter, self-illuminating pixels that deliver perfect black and intense color. LG OLED TV with AI ThinQ brings movies, sports, games and more to thrilling new life.
Inputs: 4 HDMI, 3 USB, 1 RF, 1 Composite in, 1 Ethernet, 1 Optical, 1 RS232C (Mini Jack) and Audio Return Channel Support via HDMI. Bluetooth Yes (4.2)
Dimensions (Wx H x D): TV without stand 48.3" x 30.6" x 2", TV with stand: 48.3" x 30.9" x 8.7"

LG OLED Display uses the latest panels, with brighter, self-illuminating pixels that deliver perfect black and intense color. LG OLED TV with AI ThinQ brings movies, sports, games and more to thrilling new life.
Inputs: 4 HDMI, 3 USB, 1 RF, 1 Composite in, 1 Ethernet, 1 Optical, 1 RS232C (Mini Jack) and Audio Return Channel Support via HDMI.
Dimensions (Wx H x D): TV without stand 48.3" x 30.6" x 2", TV with stand: 48.3" x 30.9" x 8.7"
